renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define R iResolution.xy
#define fr iFrame
#define ce R/2.
#define ce2 1.-R/2.

#define pi 3.141592653589793


#define BR  8.

#define t iTime*100.
//#define P  1.
#define P  s(t)*100.+10.

#define s(a) sin(a*2.*pi)*.5+.5
#define c(aa) cos(aa*2.*pi)*.5+.5

#define half(aaa) a*2.-1.

#define rnd(x) fract(3e6*sin((x+iTime)*mat2(1,13.51,73.37,-57.17)))


#define T0(cord0)  texture(iChannel0, cord0)
#define T1(cord1)  texture(iChannel1, cord1)
#define T2(cord2)  texture(iChannel2, cord2)
renderpass.name: Common
